cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Prequalification C03633 - Main Contract Building Vestvågøy - 100805
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Main contract for internal renovation of the existing radar station in Vestvågøy. The tentative construction period is set from winter 2024/2025 (only internal works) until completion in winter 2026/2027.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: 'Total' annual turnover
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer ́s ("total") annual turnover for the number of financial years requested in the tender notice or in the procurement documents is as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Average annual turnover
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer ́s average annual turnover for the number of years requested in the notice or in the procurement documents is as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: "Specific annual turnover"
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Are the tenderer's ("specific") annual turnover within the area that the contract applies to and specified in the notice or in the procurement documents for the number of accounting years requested is as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Average set-up
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Is the tenderer's average annual turnover within the area requested by the contract and specified in the notice or in the procurement documents for the number of financial years requested:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: The tenderer's establishment date
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: If the information about the turnover (combined or specific) is not available for the entire requested period, please state the date the company was established, or the tenderers started their business:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Financial key figures
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: For financial key figures stated in the notice or in the procurement documents, the tenderer declares that the actual value(s) of the requested key figures are as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Liability insurance
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The insured amount in the tenderer ́s liability insurance is the following:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Other economic and financial requirements
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Regarding any other economic and financial requirements that have been stated in the notice or in the procurement documents, the tenderer declares that:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Certificates issued by independent bodies for quality assurance standards.
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Can tenderers submit certificates issued by independent bodies that document that the tenderer fulfils the stated quality assurance standards, including universal design requirements?

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Certificates issued by independent bodies for environmental management standards.
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Is the tenderer able to submit certificates issued by independent bodies as documentation that the tenderer fulfils the stated environmental management systems or standards?

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Registered in a trade register
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tenderers are registered in a professional register in the member state in which the tenderer is established. As described in annex XI of directive 2014/24/EU; suppliers from certain member states may have to fulfil other requirements in the mentioned annex.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Registered in a trade register or company register.
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tenderers are registered in a company register or a trade register in the member state in which the tenderer is established. As described in annex XI of directive 2014/24/EU; suppliers from certain member states may have to fulfil other requirements in the mentioned annex.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Only for building and construction works:
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Only for public building and construction works: During the reference period the tenderer has carried out the following work of the requested type. The contracting authority can require up to five years experience and allow experience from the previous five years to be taken into consideration.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Technical personnel or technical units
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tenderers can use the following technical personnel or technical units , particularly those who are responsible for quality control: For technical personnel or technical units that do not directly belong to the tenderer ́s business, but if the capacity the tenderer will use, cf. part II, section C, separate ESPD forms shall be supplemented.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: For public building and construction work, technical personnel or units that shall carry out the work
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tenderers can use the following technical personnel or technical units for public building and construction work to fulfil the contract:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Technical facilities and quality assurance measures
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer utilises the following technical facilities and quality assurance measures and the tenderer ́s survey and research facility is as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Investigation and research facilities
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer ́s survey and research facilitates are as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Management and tracing of the supply chain
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer will be able to use the following management of the supply chain and tracing systems for the execution of the contract:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Control Permission
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: For goods or services that are complicated, or that in exceptional cases shall be used for a particular purpose: Will the tenderer allow checks of the tenderer's production capacity or technical capacity and, where necessary, of the survey and research facilities that the tenderer has at its disposal and of quality control measures? The inspections shall be undertaken by the contracting authority or the contracting authority can leave it to a competent public body in the country where the tenderer is established.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Education and professional qualifications
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The following education and professional qualifications are possessed by the tenderer and/or (depending on the requirements set in the notice or in the procurement documents) of the leading employees:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Environmental management measures
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tenderers can employ the following environmental management measures in connection with the execution of the contract:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Number of employees in the management
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer ́s number of employees in the management during the last three years was as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Average workforce
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer's average annual workforce in the last three years has been as follows:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Tools, materials and technical equipment.
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tenderers can use the following tools, material and technical equipment to carry out the contract:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Portion of the contract to sub-suppliers.
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: The tenderer is considering to outsource the following part (as a percentage) of the contract to sub-suppliers. Note that if the tenderer has decided to outsource a part of the contract to sub-suppliers and will use the sub-suppliers ́ capacity to carry out this part, a special ESPD will be supplemented for such sub-suppliers, see part II, section C, above.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Prequalification C03633 - Main Contract Building Vestvågøy - 100805
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Main contract for internal renovation of the existing radar station in Vestvågøy. The tentative construction period is set from winter 2024/2025 (only internal works) until completion in winter 2026/2027.
